original_text: For this is why the gospel was preached even to those who are dead, that though judged in the flesh the way people are, they might live in the spirit the way God does.
korean_text: 이를 위하여 죽은 자들에게도 복음이 전파되었으니 이는 육체로는 사람으로 심판을 받으나 영으로는 하나님을 따라 살게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: For this is why the gospel was preached
even to those who are dead
that though judged in the flesh
they might live in the spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 영으로 살 수 있게 하려는 것입니다
